reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I were welcomed by Chris and his staff. The day we arrived, we were greeted with such hospitality. Anything we needed, the staff went beyond our expectations. We stayed in he honeymoon suite. Amazing views from our balcony. The special touches were having breakfast on our balcony, seeing the creation of sculpted towels displayed on our bed. Most of all, they let us use a room since we were departing late in the day, mad our last day hassle-free. Highly recommend this hotel for a romantic getaway. Not your Carriben type vacation but the views and sunsets are the best I've seen ever. There is a lot of climbing on this island, not recommended with anyone with bad knees!
reviews.title: amazing vacation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My boyfriend & I stayed at the Artemis Villas, Santorini, for 5 nights on route to a wedding on the island of Paros. We didn't want to leave! The service is impeccable, from the welcome drink on your balcony to the drinks or snacks which arrived on the house each evening in time for the sunsets. Our ferry tickets were even collected for us. The staff here really cannot do enough for you, and Angela and Chris should be proud of their justifiably wonderful reputation on Trip Advisor. Our room was elegant and spotlessly clean, with a hot tub on the terrace overlooking the caldera. The views from the rooms and the plunge pool have to be seen to be believed. Stop reading reviews and just book -! You won't regret it!
reviews.title: Amazing location, fantastic service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed just the one night at the villas and I was extremely impressed. My boyfriend booked it as a surprize at the end of our trip and proposed as we watched the sun set. I cannot thank Angela, the owner enough, she was aware of what my boyfriend had planned and went above and beyond in making it the most special occassion. She couldn't have been more welcoming. The apartment was huge, spotlessly clean and extremely comfortable. All rooms, have a private terraces with fantastic views over the Caldera. There is also a pool on the top terrace with equally stunning views. The location is really peaceful and the perfect setting for watching the sun set. We would definitely recommend the Artemis, especially if you are planning a proposal or for a romantic trip.
reviews.title: Heaven on earth

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in beautiful Artemis Villas for 6 wonderful nights in June 2011 and all of the research planning this trip definitely paid dividends! Having already stayed for four nights in a lovely, clean, but fairly basic hotel in Crete we were ready for a touch of luxury in beautiful Santorini for the latter part of our honeymoon and Artemis Villas provided that in spades. Imerovigli is about a 20 minute brisk walk from Fira, away from the hustle and bustle of the tourist centre, on a magnificent part of the island overlooking the Caldera and Skaros. It was the perfect place for a relaxing, and stunning break and definitely not too far away from all the action should we feel like being more sociable.
reviews.title: Excellent in every aspect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent three wonderful nights here on our honeymoon in the greek islands. Words cannot describe how much we loved this place. We found it based on recommendations from a friend and other tripadvisor listings, and it was even better than we expected. The service is phenomenal - very professional and warm. The rooms all have personal balconies with complete, unobstructed views of the most beautiful view on earth (I'm sure of it!). The rooms are impeccably cleaned every day, with a lot of attention to details. There are many lovely touches here, including the complimentary welcome drink and the complimentary evening snack at sunset. Stay here, I see no reason to stay anywhere else! Also, Imerovogli is by far the best town to stay in on Santorini. Fira and Oia are very busy and commercial. Though fun to wander around them once, they are too busy and commercial if you are looking for a romantic and relaxing time in the most beautiful place on earth. Also, there are frequent city buses that link all the towns, making transportation between them very easy.
reviews.title: Amazing, amazing.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011
reviews.text: Trust me when I say we are hard to please when it comes to holiday accomodation but this place is class. Personal service, high quality rooms (we stayed in the White suite) and perfect location with unbelievable views that none of the pictures in here do justice to. Quality restaurants in walking distance (20 mins) and amazing sunsets. Perhaps a touch pricey but probably better than the typical going rate in this location (it's just expensive). We will definitely be back next time we're in santorini.
reviews.title: Fantastic!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked Artemis Villas based on reviews from TA as well as being within our budget for this side of the island. We couldn't have picked a better spot. Rooms were immaculate, we stayed in a junior suite and a studio over the week we were there, both were more than adequate and offered the spectacular view of the Skaros, Caldera and of course the sunset. As previous reviewers have mentioned what sets Artemis Villas apart from any other place I have stayed was the unprecendented level of hospitality. Chris and Angela couldn't have made us feel more welcome, to compliment their friendly conversation, advice and welcome sunset food treats, they have a small but excellent set of staff. Top tip - flip flops will only get you so far on the cliff top walk to Fira, take something sturdier.
reviews.title: Bliss

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I find it very difficult to find the words to explain how amazing this place is... My Wife and I stayed here for 5 nights in August 2011 as the first part of our honeymoon, and to say it is amazing really does not do it justice. The family run business is not your run of the mill hotel, it is much more than that. They have 10 rooms of which are located in a cliffside with the most fabulous view of the Caldera. Each room has its own balcony and magnificent view of the sunset in the evening. We were very fortunate to have room 113 which is located at the top, just underneath the swimming pool and sun bathing deck. The room is wonderfully decorated, with an amazing bed and furniture. Each morning we had breakfast brought up to our room by one of the 3 hard working staff (Eddie, Gazi & Julietta), they simply knocked the door to let us know that breakfast was on our balcony, we would open the door and sit on the balcony with the most amazing view of the caldera. We also had a jacuzzi on our balcony of which is optional. The owners Angela & Chris are simply lovely people and cannot do enough to make your stay as amazing as possible. Each evening we were treated by the wonderful Angela & Chris to some culinary delights and some wine to enjoy the sunset on our balcony. We were also brought a bottle of complimentary champagne on our first night.
reviews.title: A Different World.. You need to stay here.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Everyday, both Angela & Chris would give us their recommendations on where to visit on the island, and their advice on the best food to eat in the evening. We were never disappointed and we both ate like royalty each night. One of the days we explored the island by car, and the day before Angela arranged a car for us which was 30 Euros for 24 hours. The car was brought to us which made it all very easy. Getting around is very easy, you can walk to Fira within 20 mins (Which is all downhill from imerovigli), then a taxi back to Imerovigli is only 5 Euros if you do not fancy the walk back.
reviews.title: It is a real gem!
